name: Simplex For Industrial Solutions Limited
description: Manufacturer of computer numerical control machines designed to provide automated cutting and engraving of wooden and marble works. The company's machines are of different features to satisfy the customer's needs, which can reduce waste, frequency of errors, and the time the finished product takes to get to market, enabling clients to save time and increase productivity of their business.
one_liner: Manufacturer of computer numerical control machines designed to provide automated cutting and engraving of wooden and marble works. The company's machines are of different features to satisfy the customer's needs, which can reduce waste, frequency of errors, and the time the finished product takes to get to market, enabling clients to save time and increase productivity of their business.
